DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective investigate effect low high glycemic index ( GI ) meal vary protein content plasma glucose insulin response , subjective rating hunger , subsequent food intake twenty healthy , sedentary , overweight obese men woman age 21-65 .
DOC.detailed_description: Each individual participate separately four test session . Each test session last approximately 5 hour separate minimum one week . Participants arrive Temple University GCRC CORE either 7:30 a.m. 8:30 a.m. overnight fast ( 10-12 hour ) ensure participant metabolic state . Upon arrival experimenter ask participant complete pre-session questionnaire rate feeling hunger satiety visual analog scale ( VAS ) . An indwelling catheter insert antecubital vein study nurse baseline blood sample obtain measurement glucose insulin concentration . Glucose measure glucose oxidase method use glucose analyzer insulin measure radioimmunoassay . One four isocaloric meal ( see example ) , vary macronutrient content GI value food , administer random order either 8:00 a.m. 9:00 a.m. Energy density control . The meal 8 ounce water consume within fifteen minute . A short visual analog questionnaire distribute conclusion meal rate meal consume . Blood sample take 15 minute food consumption 30 minute interval ( i.e. , 30 , 60 , 90 , 120 , 150 , 180 , 210 , 240 minute ) four hour follow administration meal . Four milliliter blood collect time point ( via indwell catheter ) , result total 40 milliliter blood collect study session 160 milliliter ( i.e. , 40 ml x 4 testing session ) within 8 week time period . Participants ask rate feeling hunger time point . Following last blood sample , participant give opportunity consume food ad libitum buffet style lunch . Based known serve sizes measurement unconsumed food , amount food eaten associate energy content determine .
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 2165 BMI 2540 ( kg/m2 ) Individuals currently diet restrict food intake report preexist health affliction diabetes , use prescription medication , use appetite suppressant , regular tobacco use exclude study may affect appetite impact dependent measure study .
